content: /*********************************************************************/ /* Customer processing can be added here */ /*********************************************************************/ "PIPE CP XAUTOLOG TCPIP" /* AUTOLOGON TCPIP VSM */ "CP SET MDC STOR 0M 256M" /* LIMIT MDISK CACHE 256M */ "CP SET SRM STORBUF 300% 250% 200%" /* VSM MEMORY OVERCOMMIT */ /* ------ ROUTE SCIF MESSAGES TO PROP FOR SYSLOG OR HANDLING ------ */ "PIPE CP SET SECUSER DIRMAINT OPERATOR" /* SEND DIRMM MSGS TO PROP */ "PIPE CP SET SECUSER DIRMSAT1 OPERATOR" /* SEND DIRMS MSGS TO PROP */ "PIPE CP SET SECUSER DIRMSAT2 OPERATOR" /* SEND DIRMS MSGS TO PROP */ "PIPE CP SET SECUSER DIRMSAT3 OPERATOR" /* SEND DIRMS MSGS TO PROP */ ... Note: If you need more functions than are described in this section, see 4.3, “Operations Manager” on page 88. Chapter 6. Configuring z/VM 197 d. Save your changes and quit XEDIT: ====> file e. Perform the previous set of steps on all other members in the SSI cluster. The PROFILE EXEC
